TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed TableCallback extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub TableCallback(tableData As ICollection)

param.name: tableData
param.span: 要從提供者擷取的資料。

span.span: The data to retrieve from the provider.

summary.span: 從提供者擷取資料表資料時，參考要呼叫的方法。

span.span: References the method to call when retrieving table data from a provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當 Web 組件控制項實作介面並且可做為 Web 組件連接中，取用者或轉換程式中的提供者必須擷取和處理提供者的資料表資料。When a Web Parts control implements the interface and serves as a provider in a Web Parts connection, the consumer or transformer must retrieve and process the table data from the provider. 委派表示要處理的提供者資料所呼叫的方法。The delegate represents the method to call for processing the provider data. 方法包含委派參數。The method contains a delegate parameter. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例包含名為 Web 組件控制項`TableProviderWebPart`做為資料表的表單中的資料提供者。The following code example contains a Web Parts control named `TableProviderWebPart` that serves as a provider of data in the form of a table. 這個控制項包含的實作方法，並在接收的類型參數的。The control includes an implementation of the method, which receives a parameter of type . 這個方法會呼叫所表示的方法委派傳遞資料表資料。This method calls the method represented by the delegate passing the table data. [!code-csharp[WebParts_TableCallback_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_TableCallback_Overview/CS/tableprovider.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebParts_TableCallback_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_TableCallback_Overview/VB/tableprovider.vb#1)] 在`OnPreRender`方法中，取用者可以呼叫`GetTableData`中`TableProviderWebPart`並傳遞其`GetTableData`方法的呼叫與資料表資料，如下列程式碼範例所示的委派。In the `OnPreRender` method, the consumer calls `GetTableData` in `TableProviderWebPart` and passes its `GetTableData` method as the delegate to call with the table data, as shown in the following code example. [!code-csharp[WebParts_TableCallback_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_TableCallback_Overview/CS/tableconsumerwebpart.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_TableCallback_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_TableCallback_Overview/VB/tableconsumerwebpart.vb#2)] 兩個控制項和連線會包含在網頁上，如下列範例所示。The two controls and the connection are included in a Web page, as shown in the following example. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_TableCallback_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_TableCallback_Overview/CS/TableConnection.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_TableCallback_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_TableCallback_Overview/VB/TableConnection.aspx#3)]
